nodes.label: 1) Configuration: Frontend (HTTPS/wss), Backend (env vars), Key Vault (secrets)
2) Auth: Entra redirect URIs, AUTH_REQUIRED=true, test user token works
3) Chat: POST /api/v1/chat returns 200, Foundry or fallback works, memory writes
4) Voice: WS proxy or WebRTC direct works, no 401s, audio response received
5) Avatar: token + ICE creds work, video stream plays
6) Tri-Search: POST /api/v1/memory/search returns results, enrich writes
7) MCP + Tools: tools/list returns manifest, tool endpoints respond
Go: All checks pass, no Mixed Content, no 401s
No-Go: VoiceLive 401, ICE fails, auth fails, memory empty
